thread.title: Quiz: Name the record Premier League scorer at each club? | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Quiz: Name the record Premier League scorer at each club? | Daily Mail Online

title: Quiz: Name the record Premier League scorer at each club? | Daily Mail Online
text: Do you know the record Premier League scorer at each top-flight club? Test yourself in our challenging quiz We have identified the record scorer of all 20 Premier League clubs Only Premier League goals count in each player's total There are four possible answers for each of the 20 questions Published: 10:27 GMT, 24 February 2017 | Updated: 10:58 GMT, 24 February 2017 5 shares comments Goalscorers often claim the headlines and the glory, such is the importance of winning matches. And those who regularly get on the scoresheet over a sustained period - often in twos and threes - become revered at their clubs and sometimes throughout the league. And while you would probably have very little trouble identifying the record Premier League scorer at your club, how well do you know the equivalent at each of the 20 top-flight clubs in England? Take our quiz below to see how well you know each club's record Premier League scorer Your challenge this week is to guess each Premier League club's top goalscorer (in Premier League competition only). If you're unable to see the quiz in the MailOnline app or in Facebook Instant Articles please click on the following link to view it on our website instead . RELATED ARTICLES
